sub_title: IT Manager | Business Analyst | Project Manager
summary: I enjoy working at the edge of business and technology! I bring more than ten years of experience managing IT applications and running end-to-end technical projects that accelerate business outcomes. Having broad expertise in business analysis, project management and product management I cover full cycle of value delivery ensuring governance and reliable controls. With my involvement, IT is no longer a black box: I put people and value they create in the center of everything.

[{'title': 'Launch of Network Operation Center', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'As Project/Product manager I led an agile Incident management automation of full cycle of NOC support operations.

•	Led IT solutions roll-outs across operational companies with multimillion-dollar budget by managing delivery scope, schedule, budget, communications and guiding teams for contracts, hardware shipments, software development and acceptance programs.
•	Managed global procurement for IT solutions delivery engaging vendors and stakeholders in requirements definition, precise solution evaluation and contract preparation to ensure target business outcomes and cost-efficiency.
•	Developed a set of IT products by eliciting requirements, defining solution designs, managing backlog, guiding agile development and stakeholder engagement. Product launches led to increased business efficiency (up to 30% in contract management), secured target revenues and uncovered new business opportunities.
•	Engaging senior management, defined the principal IT landscape and its roll-out strategy in support of the new business direction: applications and cross-integrations.
•	Performed processes and systems adoption to align with industry standards and controls (GDPR, corporate and ITIL controls) engaging compliance and legal teams.
•	Led distributed teams of cross-functional experts (sales, legal, compliance, finance, DevOps) and senior management ensuring their timely contribution to project success and mitigating resistance.

Awarded as ‘Key staff member’ for the major contribution to achieving wholesale direction’s business goals.

• Performed requirements analysis and solutions design definition to scope desired automation collaborating with technical departments and engaging business stakeholders.
• Provided end to end support for the set of B2B IT systems. Served as single point of contact for business requests (incidents, change requests, data requests) ensuring proper classification, prioritization, troubleshooting, backlog management and coordination through further delivery according to contract terms or SLA.
